attributes.action: Stop abusive behaviour towards child in all education settings.
attributes.additional_details: We need the government to hold schools more accountable for reporting criminal activity to the police, instead of keeping it within the school, they need to treat abuse as abuse and stop the treatment including physical attacks, sexual assault and trauma being I flicked by children to other children. If this behaviour was to happens anywhere else it would not be acceptable even towards the country most prolific criminals, actions would be taken.
attributes.background: There needs to be the equivalent protections for children experiencing abuse in schools, as there is for the rest of society in all other areas of society.

rejection.details:
There are already safeguarding regulations in place that require schools to report safeguarding concerns. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/keeping-children-safe-in-education--2

If you have concerns about a particular school, you can find information about how to complain here: https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-school
